import pyautomation

# Bring up the Start menu
pyautomation.send_keys('{LWIN}')
pyautomation.sleep(0.5)

# Type "notepad" to search for the application
pyautomation.send_keys('notepad')
pyautomation.sleep(0.5)

# Press Enter to launch Notepad
pyautomation.send_keys('{ENTER}')
pyautomation.sleep(1)

# Verify Notepad window appears
try:
    # Use top_window() to get the foreground window (Notepad should be active)
    notepad = pyautomation.Desktop(backend="win32").top_window()
    if notepad and "notepad" in notepad.window_text().lower():
        print("EXECUTION_SUCCESS")
    else:
        print("FAILED: Notepad window not detected")
except Exception as e:
    print("FAILED:", str(e))
